channel.title: Good server ready to host - (317)
channel.description:
First off credits : maker of Decimation-x for making client and base i edited me because i got rid of stupid stuff and added alot of things Pictures....... -New home made by me [URL=http://img651.imageshack.us/i/0023l.png/][IMG]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/8810/0023l.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
-Custom "clan wars" with chaos ele that drops pvp gear all fenced in
[URL=http://img545.imageshack.us/i/0024w.png/][IMG]http://img545.imageshack.us/img545/2260/0024w.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Good server ready to host - (317)
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“tehsandbox, post:38, topic:379538”][quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=475375.msg3520572#msg3520572 date=1299370808]

Ok so basicly i released this source, yes you change home added some interesting features but as far as im concerned its the same. You couldnt even figure out how to make yourself owner. Seeing as you have the co-owner crown. So before your next release make sure you understand all the inner workings of a source.
otherwise i do like a few of your changes.

I challenged him with the same concept and he avoided my post. Tehsandbox does not deserve credits for this “release”.
[/quote]

You mad bro?[/quote]
See, and you say people like me. Try answering the questions I asked as they were genuine.

Read full topic
